alt: Project BARAKO Deployed in an Area
title: Project BARAKO
description: The Batangas Actions towards Revitalization of Kapeng Barako Industry Project aims to develop an optimized method of propagating kapeng Barako seedlings.

title: Project SIGAW
description: A cost-efficient tsunami early warning system to serve as an early warning to high-risk coastal areas. Several SIGAW units have been installed in the provinces of Batangas and Quezon with additional units being developed.
